item.title: Creating a OSD in GCP with Existing VPCs - CLI
item.description: Roberto Carratalá, Andrea Bozzoni Last updated 11/14/2022 This is a guide to install OSD in GCP within Existing Virtual Private Clouds (VPCs) using CLI tools (gcloud CLI) or Terraform. The guide will show all the steps to create all the networking prerequisites in GCP and then installing the OSD Cluster in GCP. Tip The official documentation for installing a OSD cluster in GCP can be found here. Prerequisites gcloud CLI jq NOTE: Also the GCloud Shell can be used, and have the gcloud cli among other tools preinstalled.
